div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Warner Center – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Woodland Hills apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens featuring brand name appliances and in-unit washer and dryers. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put, our Woodland Hills apartments offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. You deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves Warner Center, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Canoga Avenue, our Woodland Hills apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 101 and 405 freeways, public transportation, and attractions like the Jewish-American Hall of Fame and Joseph Wahl Arts Gallery. Restaurants like Brother's Sushi, Ruth's Chris Steak House and Café Bellissimo are also located near our Woodland apartments and provide the perfect place to hang out with friends and family. Along with the convenient features and amenities available at eaves Warner Center, you’ll also have access to a wide range of other services to make life more comfortable such as complimentary package acceptance and a professional bilingual staff to help you. Had trouble getting maintenance issues fixed in previous residences? At eaves Warner Center, we’ll take care of any maintenance issues that arise – allowing you to focus on the more important parts of your life. Don't wait any longer! Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Woodland Hills apartments in Los Angeles County today!

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Get a little extra choice. Pick the perfect apartment to call home from our variety of finish packages.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions.

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Warner Center – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Woodland Hills apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens featuring brand name appliances and in-unit washer and dryers. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put, our Woodland Hills apartments offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. You deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves Warner Center, that's exactly what you'll get. Located on Canoga Avenue, our Woodland Hills apartment community is conveniently located within easy access of the 101 and 405 freeways, public transportation, and attractions like the Jewish-American Hall of Fame and Joseph Wahl Arts Gallery. Restaurants like Brother's Sushi, Ruth's Chris Steak House and Café Bellissimo are also located near our Woodland apartments and provide the perfect place to hang out with friends and family. Along with the convenient features and amenities available at eaves Warner Center, you’ll also have access to a wide range of other services to make life more comfortable such as complimentary package acceptance and a professional bilingual staff to help you. Had trouble getting maintenance issues fixed in previous residences? At eaves Warner Center, we’ll take care of any maintenance issues that arise – allowing you to focus on the more important parts of your life. Don't wait any longer!
